name: Merge Adventure: Magic Dragons
description:
Welcome to Merge Adventure: Magic Dragons

Embark on epic adventure to discover merge games, collect and merge dragons on a quest to free the Realm.

Using your merge magic powers to match and merge dragons! Clearing the magic puzzles through cursed gardens.
Challenge the ancient Gods like Zeus, Thor, Aphrodite to unlock epic creatures, dragons and fables to help you in your adventures.

Play free merge games loved by millions of players around the world.

★ Gameplay
- Match and merge dragons to discover larger and more powerful wonders.
- Manage resources, power, and energy, free the clouds to discover and grow your merge gardens.
- Use your power to hatch, tame, and grow dragons and make them harvest for your merge county.

★ Merge
- Drag items and dragons anywhere on the map, match 3 or more and merge them into an epic version of themselves!
- Numerous combinations are possible and the sky is the limit!

★ Merge & Magic
- Merge to earn awesome rewards during your adventure to help you along with your gardens.
- Unlock the mighty force of gods, like Zeus, Thor, Aphrodite and others!

★ Solve Magic Puzzles
- Complete magic puzzles filled with challenges and rewards you can use to free your kingdom.
- Advance on your journey by completing and solving challenges, magic puzzles and merge games.
- Build your Realm, clear the clouds and free your kingdom.
- Lift the curse and free the land.

★ Collect & Tame Dragons
- Discover and collect hundreds of dragons and wonders!
- Use merge & magic to expand your kingdom and bring it to life!
- Collect coins, minerals, gems and energy and use them wisely to grow your power and your Realm!
- Collect dozens of mythical creatures like unicorns, magic dragons and many others, to make them work for you collecting fables!

Do you have what it takes? Start your merge adventure today, solve hundred of merge games, magic puzzles, challenges and free the Realm!
